name: Blaster
overview: Unfinished prototype for the 5200/8bit line that resembles the Death Star ground attack sequence from "Star Wars". It is unlikely "Blaster" would have been the final name. You are in a ship flying towards a horizon with many enemies and obstacles; you can shoot at enemies and fly around/through obstacles until your shield is depleted from hits. Enemies and objects are drawn in outline form with a pseudo-3D approach.
